vaults.author: Gauthier Viau
vaults.overview: To achieve good and reliable performance, games using DX12 on PC need to manage memory themselves. This presentation goes over Snowdrop's heaps allocation strategies, as well as how its texture streamer is used to manage memory.Attendees will learn how to use the Windows Performance Analyzer to diagnose VRAM overcommitment issues coming from OS automatic resource demotion, using real examples of performance degradations due to bad memory management in Snowdrop with DX12.Solutions to address these issues a resource residency management system and the texture streamer usage of DirectX tiled resources to free large amount of memory while minimizing quality loss are discussed, as well as what didn't work so well.
vaults.translated: 为了实现良好的性能，在PC上使用DX12的游戏需要自行管理内存。本演示文稿涉及Snowdrop的堆分配策略，以及如何使用其纹理流媒体来管理内存。Attendees将学习如何使用Windows Performance Analyzer诊断来自OS自动资源降级的VRAM额外承诺问题，并使用绩效降级的真实示例来诊断。由于在雪花台上使用DX12的记忆管理不良。解决这些问题的溶液资源居住管理系统和Directx瓷砖资源的质地流媒体使用以释放大量内存，同时讨论了最小化的质量损失，以及什么不起作用很好。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Advanced Graphics Summit: Making Connections: Real-Time Path-Traced Ligh...
vaults.author: Evan Hart
vaults.overview: Path traced effects in games have been a dream of many since the early days of real-time rendering. The advent of hardware accelerated ray tracing and recent advances in algorithms derived from Reservoir-based Spatio-Temporal Importance Sampling (ReSTIR) have turned those dreams into reality. In this session, Evan and Adam discuss the theoretical and practical elements necessary to add real-time pathtraced lighting to an advanced, modern game engine (Unreal Engine 5). Specifically, the team discusses changes to the light transport model and scalability that enhance existing engine systems to handle dramatically more complex lighting environments.
vaults.translated: 自实时渲染的早期以来，游戏中的效果一直是许多人的梦想。硬件加速射线追踪的出现以及源自基于水库的时空重要性采样（Restir）的算法的最新进展已将这些梦想变成了现实。在本次会议中，埃文（Evan）和亚当（Adam）讨论了将实时病理照明添加到高级现代游戏引擎（虚幻引擎5）所需的理论和实用元素。具体而言，团队讨论了轻型传输模型和可扩展性的变化，这些变化增强了现有的发动机系统以处理更复杂的照明环境。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Advanced Graphics Summit: Raytracing in Snowdrop: An Optimized Lighting ...
vaults.author: Quentin Kuenlin
vaults.overview: This presentation provides an overview of the pipeline used for the raytraced global illumination and raytraced reflections in the Snowdrop engine. It goes into a deep dive into the probe system used to light the forward rendered objects and also as a cache for the global illumination and reflections. The two probe placement strategies, a grid based one and a new octree based one, are described alongside their advantages and drawbacks. Next, it presents the raytracing done from the gbuffer for both the global illumination and the reflection. Various optimizations are presented, including the use of screen space tracing to reduce the number of world space ray needed, as well as improving raytraced lighting quality.The next section briefly covers the denoising strategy used in Snowdrop. Several denoiser options are provided, including AMD Fidelity FX Reflection Denoiser, Nvidia's raytracing Denoisers, as well as two custom in-house denoisers.Finally, the presentation ends on how the raytraced result are applied to the final image.
vaults.translated: 该演示文稿概述了用于雪花发动机中的射线扫带全球照明和射线式反射的管道。它深入研究了用于点亮正向渲染对象的探针系统，也可以作为全球照明和反射的缓存。两种基于网格的探针放置策略和基于新的OCTREE的探针策略与它们的优势和缺点一起描述了。接下来，它为全球照明和反射介绍了Gbuffer的射线跟踪。提出了各种优化，包括使用屏幕空间跟踪来减少所需的世界空间射线数量，并提高了射线式照明质量。提供了几种Denoiser选项，包括AMD Fidelity FX反射Denoiser，Nvidia的RayTracing Denoiser，以及两个自定义的内部Denoisers。在本文中，演示文稿以如何将射线tractac结果应用于最终图像上。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Animation Summit: Make a Choice: Performance Direction in 'Baldur's Gate 3'
vaults.author: Greg Lidstone
vaults.overview: Mocap and Performance direction have become an increasingly important part of narrative video game development over the past 20 years while players have steadily grown more discerning about digital acting. Larian invests heavily in character performance, and their recent blockbuster 'Baldur's Gate 3' has received rave reviews for the effort. But how did Larian arrive at those performances? How do performance directors help actors make choices when crafting the personality and physical behaviour of characters? How do they redirect and adjust when things aren't going well; inspire and encourage when they are. How do we inform, but not overwhelm and collaborate to build character with our actors? In this session, Larian's Performance Director speaks about techniques and approaches used on 'Baldur's Gate 3' (and built up over 20 years of directing) to prepare and work with actors for memorable performances.
vaults.translated: 在过去的20年中，MOCAP和性能方向已成为叙事视频游戏开发的越来越重要的一部分，而玩家对数字表演越来越敏锐。拉里安（Larian）在角色表现上进行了大量投资，他们最近的大片“鲍德尔（Baldur）的大门3”（Baldur's Gate 3）获得了努力的好评。但是，拉里安（Larian）是如何表演的呢？在制定角色的个性和身体行为时，表演导演如何帮助演员做出选择？当事情进展顺利时，它们如何重定向和调整；何时启发和鼓励。我们如何告知但不淹没并合作与演员建立角色？在本次会议上，拉里安（Larian）的表演总监谈到了“鲍德尔（Baldur）的大门3”（并建立了20多年的导演）上使用的技术和方法，以准备和与演员合作，以表演令人难忘的表演。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Animation Summit: Thwips and Hugs: The Animation of 'Marvel's Spider-Man 2'
vaults.author: Lindsay Thompson
vaults.overview: Join the esteemed team of Insomniac Animation Directors as they guide you on an immersive journey behind the scenes, offering a deeper exploration of the creative process behind Marvel's Spider-Man 2's animated world. From the intricacies of cinematic Quick Time Events (QTEs) to the technical and creative process of bringing ASL to the screen, they delve into both the technical challenges and creative triumphs encountered along the way. Additionally, they provide an in-depth glimpse into one of our most ambitious boss missions to date. Through this presentation, the teams aims to unveil the 'Insomniac Way,' shedding light on the inner workings and accomplishments of our animation team.
vaults.translated: 加入著名的失眠动画导演团队，指导您进入幕后的身临其境的旅程，从而更深入地探索Marvel的Spider-Man 2动画世界背后的创作过程。从电影快速时间事件（QTE）的复杂性到将ASL带入屏幕的技术和创造过程，他们都深入研究了沿途遇到的技术挑战和创造性的胜利。此外，他们深入了解了迄今为止我们最雄心勃勃的老板任务之一。通过此演讲，团队的目标是揭露“失眠方式”，阐明了我们动画团队的内部运作和成就。

vaults.author: Chris Pruett
vaults.overview: Asgard's Wrath 2 is a full-fledged open-world RPG built from the ground up for VR. Players explore an epic, living world in this massive action RPG that IGN called a "10/10 masterpiece." Join Sanzaru Games as the team shares how they developed one of the largest, most complex, and most well-reviewed VR games of all time. Technical, design, and business: this session is a deep dive into what the high end of VR development looks like.

vaults.title: 'Brawl Stars': Learnings from the Removal of Loot Boxes
vaults.author: Frank Yan
vaults.overview: Frank Keienburg, General Manager for 'Brawl Stars' and Frank Yan, Game Designer of 'Brawl Stars' discusses the process of removing lootboxes from Brawl Stars entirely and how the game became less engaging as a result. They cover what they did in the year since and the subsequent results, speaking to the impact of randomized rewards for the game as well as how they analyze what's right for the game using a combination of community sentiment, data, and designer intuition.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: 2D and Tomorrow: How the Developers of 'Super Mario Bros. Wonder' Find N...
vaults.author: Shiro Mouri
vaults.overview: Following last year's launch of the Super Mario Bros.TM Wonder game, developers Takashi Tezuka and Shiro Mouri discuss the unique challenge of taking classic side-scrolling Super Mario Bros. gameplay and turning it upside downliterally. The developers explain how the game's new elements such as Wonder effects that flip, spin and transform the game's Flower Kingdom world draw inspiration from Mario's 2D past but deliver unexpected new surprises for players to discover. Mr. Tezuka and Mr. Mouri will also share insights on the game's creative first steps, how they expanded player choice options and the process of adding a new online experience to the game. Wowie Zowie!
vaults.translated: 在去年推出了Super Mario Bros.tm Wonder游戏之后，开发人员Takashi Tezuka和Shiro Mouri讨论了参加经典的Super Super Mario Bros.游戏玩法的独特挑战，并将其倒置。开发人员解释了游戏的新元素，例如如何翻转，旋转和改变游戏的Flower Kingdom World从Mario的2d过去汲取灵感，但给玩家带来了意想不到的新惊喜。Tezuka先生和Mouri先生还将分享有关游戏创意的第一步的见解，他们如何扩展玩家选择选项以及为游戏添加新的在线体验的过程。哇Zowie！

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: 3D Gaussian Splatting in Game Development: What Internet Doesn't Tell Yo...
vaults.author: Jack Wang
vaults.overview: AI and Neural Networks have stormed the 3D industry in the last couple of years, introducing us to a myriad of innovative technologies like NeRFs, NeuS, NeuralAngelo, and 3D Gaussian Splatting. These technologies all promise to create photorealistic 3D assets from photos or videos, but are they all they're claimed up to be? Amidst the dazzling social media posts and research papers, actual 3D creators and game developers rarely have the opportunity nor the skills to try them. In this presentation, we'll embark on a journey through these cutting-edge technologies, aiming to demystify 3D Gaussian Splatting and its counterparts. By the end of this session, you'll not only understand the significance of 3D Gaussian Splatting but also appreciate its limitations. Our aim is to equip you with a deeper understanding of these technologies and a glimpse into the exciting future of 3D in the world of game development.
vaults.translated: 在过去的几年中，AI和神经网络席卷了3D行业，向我们介绍了无数的创新技术，例如Nerfs，Neus，Neurangelo和3D高斯分裂。这些技术都承诺从照片或视频中创建感性的3D资产，但是它们是所有人所声称的吗？在令人眼花soci乱的社交媒体帖子和研究论文中，实际的3D创建者和游戏开发人员很少有机会，也没有尝试它们的技能。在本演讲中，我们将踏上这些尖端技术的旅程，旨在揭开3D高斯分裂及其同行的神秘面纱。到本次会议结束时，您不仅可以理解3D高斯分裂的重要性，而且还要理解其局限性。我们的目的是使您对这些技术有更深入的了解，并瞥见游戏开发世界中3D令人兴奋的未来。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: A Second Shot: Improving Ranged Combat in 'The Last of Us Part II'
vaults.author: Derek Mattson
vaults.overview: Third-person shooters are a notoriously difficult nut to crack in game design. The decoupling of the camera from the player creates as many problems as ways to solve them. In this session, discover how Naughty Dog improved the gunplay of its predecessor in The Last of Us Part II. Derek Mattson goes over the solutions used in The Last of Us Part II to address common issues with third-person shooters such as camera vs character perception, weapon feel, hit detection, and input delay. In addition, Derek provides a glimpse into how these solutions were tested and verified with in-engine debugging.
vaults.translated: 第三人称射击游戏在游戏设计中很难破解。摄像机与播放器的脱钩会产生与解决这些问题一样多的问题。在本次会议上，发现顽皮的狗如何改善我们最后一部分的前身的枪声。德里克·马特森（Derek Mattson）介绍了第二部分中使用的解决方案，以解决第三人称射击者（例如角色感知，武器感觉，命中率，检测和输入延迟）的常见问题。此外，德里克（Derek）瞥见了如何通过发动机调试对这些解决方案进行测试和验证。

vaults.author: Francisco Souki
vaults.overview: Using footage from the alpha and final builds of the game, I Expect You To Die 3 Design Director Francisco Souki walks attendees through the design work of taking a level from halfway-done to final. "Before-and-after" comparisons illustrate specific solutions, and Francisco shares details on defining and directing the processes used to identify the problems to solve with the alpha build, and how to work with the team to define a plan for solutions.
vaults.translated: 使用Alpha和游戏的最终构建的录像，我希望您能在3个设计总监Francisco Souki Walks参与者中死亡，其中包括从中途完成的设计工作。“前后”比较说明了特定的解决方案，而弗朗西斯科（Francisco）分享了定义和指导用于确定与Alpha构建解决问题的过程的详细信息，以及如何与团队合作以定义解决方案计划。

vaults.title: Balancing the Scales: Enabling Player Safety Without Compromising Privac...
vaults.author: Mike Pappas
vaults.overview: Delve into the nuanced tension between the imperative of safeguarding user experiences and the equally crucial need to protect user privacy, and how this tension is informed and altered by recent and upcoming online safety regulations. This in-depth conversation covers a variety of pressing topics, from the ethical considerations surrounding data collection for content moderation to the specific challenges posed by minors and Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Furthermore, the panel addresses legal obligations, including what actions are requisite under the duty of care to usersa duty that varies significantly across jurisdictions. The panel will also examine upcoming regulations that game studios need to be prepared for. This session is especially relevant for developers and platform owners seeking to navigate these murky waters, providing insights into crafting safer online spaces without crossing the boundary into surveillance.
vaults.translated: 深入研究保护用户体验的必要性与保护用户隐私同样至关重要的需求之间的细微趋势，以及如何通过最近和即将到来的在线安全法规来告知和改变这种张力。从围绕数据收集的数据收集到未成年人和个人身份信息（PII）所面临的特定挑战（PII）的特定挑战，这一深入的对话涵盖了各种紧迫的主题。此外，该小组还涉及法律义务，包括在司法管辖区各义务承担责任的必要责任。该小组还将检查游戏工作室需要准备的即将到来的法规。本届会议与寻求浏览这些模糊水域的开发人员和平台所有者尤其重要，从而提供了洞察力，以洞悉更安全的在线空间，而不会越过边界进行监视。

vaults.author: Avram Lyon
vaults.overview: In April 2023, Scopely debuted MONOPOLY GO!, which instantly captivated millions of players around the world and became the biggest mobile game launch of 2023. Underpinning MONOPOLY GO!'s record-breaking success is Scopely's Playgami technology, connecting a massive global community spanning more than 120 countries. In this session, the architects of MONOPOLY GO! share key learnings from the development and global scaling of the game, including how Playgami's GameMaker Server framework builds on core AWS services like Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon RDS, and Amazon SQS to achieve smooth operations and rapid iteration. Learn how these choices allow the team to scale and deliver exceptional experiences to millions of MONOPOLY tycoons every day.

vaults.author: Daniel Cook
vaults.overview: This panel invites you to a thought-provoking discussion centered on a pivotal question: What if we integrated safety directly into game platform design, rather than addressing toxicity and abuse as afterthoughts? Our panelists, each offering distinct insights, will delve into the potential of game platforms rooted in safety-first principles. Additionally, we will explore the critical role of giving players control and consent mechanisms, essential in cultivating a secure gaming environment. This session aims to shed light on the vital yet often overlooked intersection of safety, user experience, and community engagement in game design.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Classic Game Postmortem: 'Karateka'
vaults.author: Jordan Mechner
vaults.overview: Before Prince of Persia, there was Karateka. Released in 1984, the directorial debut of game creator Jordan Mechner was a worldwide hit, full of groundbreaking innovations in story, cinematics, music, and animation. It was also the work of an unknown teenager looking to break into the game industry. Forty years later, Jordan discusses how he pushed the limits of Apple II technology to create his breakthrough success. Through original design documents, film footage, prototype gameplay, and more, Jordan tells the story of how he developed his craft as an independent game developer and brought the illusion of life to computer screens around the world with Karateka.
vaults.translated: 在波斯王子之前，有空手道。游戏创作者乔丹·梅切纳（Jordan Mechner）的导演首次亮相于1984年发行，在全球范围内，充满了故事，电影，音乐和动画的开创性创新。这也是一个希望闯入游戏行业的未知少年的工作。四十年后，乔丹讨论了他如何推动Apple II技术的极限以创造突破性的成功。通过原始的设计文档，电影镜头，原型游戏玩法等等，约旦讲述了他如何发展自己作为独立游戏开发人员的手艺，并将生活的幻想带到了Karateka的世界各地的计算机屏幕上。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Converging Game Design and AI: New Frontiers and Pitfalls
vaults.author: Hilary Mason
vaults.overview: Although it's a hot topic now, AI and machine learning have existed in and outside of games for many years! To fully grasp the power of AI to transform game development, we have to understand how it works and where it's best put to use.Hilary Mason, Co-Founder and CEO at Hidden Door, gives attendees a peek behind the hidden door of AI's current integration into game development. In this session, she outlines the current state of AI as a game dev tool and explains its strengths and shortcomings. Hilary then presents potential solutions for common AI challengessuch as filtering out bad outputs and carefully handling the ethics of AI's use of copyrighted material. She then discusses how to assemble the ultimate AI game development dream team, merging the powers of man and machine to create entirely new gaming experiences.
vaults.translated: 尽管现在这是一个热门话题，但多年来，AI和机器学习已经存在和外部！要完全掌握AI改变游戏开发的力量，我们必须了解它的工作原理以及最好的使用方式。HillaryMason，Hidden Door的联合创始人兼首席执行官，让与会者在AI当前的隐藏门后面窥视集成到游戏开发中。在本届会议上，她概述了AI的当前状态作为游戏开发工具，并解释了其优势和缺点。然后，希拉里（Hilary）为普通的AI挑战提供了潜在的解决方案，因为它可以过滤不良的输出，并仔细处理AI使用受版权保护材料的伦理。然后，她讨论了如何组装最终的AI游戏开发梦想团队，将人类和机器的力量融合在一起，以创造全新的游戏体验。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Crafting and Balancing the Story and Characters in 'Marvel's Spider-Man 2'
vaults.author: Jon Paquette
vaults.overview: 'Marvel's Spider-Man 2' is the third game in a franchise that has built its own universe of intersecting characters and stories (Earth-1048). How does the story team at Insomniac balance the needs of the story with the ever-changing demands of the audience? In this talk, Senior Narrative Director Jon Paquette takes you through Insomniac's process, and how the team relies on feedback to help drive their storytelling craft.
vaults.translated: “ Marvel's Spider-Man 2”是特许经营中的第三款游戏，该系列建立了自己的相交角色和故事（Earth-1048）。Insomniac的故事团队如何平衡故事的需求与观众的不断变化的需求？在这次演讲中，高级叙事总监乔恩·帕奎特（Jon Paquette）将带您完成Insomniac的过程，以及团队如何依靠反馈来帮助推动他们的讲故事的工艺。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Designing Active Time Lore for 'Final Fantasy XVI'
vaults.author: Momoka Aono
vaults.overview: For a story-driven game which has heavy and complex lore, players' understanding the in-game world leads to deeper immersion, but the in-game terminology and unique world rules sometimes make players feel that it's hard to grasp the background.nWhile fantasy games often use glossary and texts to introduce the in-game world's rules, what people's common sense is, or lots of characters and place names that difficult to remember, most players, except the ones who are interested in lore, rarely reads them.nIn this session, we will demonstrate how UIs can help players better understand the story of the game through examples of the lore support system called "Active Time Lore", invented for FINAL FANTASY XVI.nActive Time Lore helps players with a selection of lore tips they need "at the moment" by responding to input a player's pausing during a cutscene or gameplay.
vaults.translated: 对于故事驱动的游戏具有沉重而复杂的知识，玩家的理解游戏中的世界会导致更深的沉浸式，但是游戏中的术语和独特的世界规则有时会使玩家感到很难掌握背景。游戏经常使用词汇表和文本来介绍游戏中的世界规则，人们的常识是什么，或者很多难以记住的角色和位置名称，除了对知识感兴趣的人以外，大多数玩家很少阅读他们。在本届会议上，我们将展示UIS如何通过称为“ Active Time Lore”的传说支持系统的示例来帮助玩家更好地理解游戏的故事，该系统为《最终幻想》 XVI发明了，努力的传说可帮助玩家提供一系列知​​识的技巧。需要在过场动画或游戏玩法中响应输入玩家的暂停，需要“目前”。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Developing 'Hi-Fi RUSH' Backwards and Finding Our Positive Gameplay Loop
vaults.author: John Johanas
vaults.overview: In this session, Game Director John Johanas shares how the initial concept for Hi-Fi RUSH came to be. From there, he provides in-depth details into the development team's early learnings on approaching this type of rhythm-action title. This required approaching their game design philosophy from a totally different angle than they've done previously, essentially working backwards from their desired result for Hi-Fi RUSH.John goes over specific examples of how the team gained these learnings through gameplay and how this approach affected other core elements of the game - specifically, how defining their mechanics with core pillars solidified a "positive feedback loop" for the user and lowered the barrier to entry to enjoy Hi-Fi RUSH. This session covers how Tango approached combining music and the action game genre, but this approach can be applied to any teams attempting to implement creative ideas outside of their comfort zone.
vaults.translated: 在本次会议上，游戏总监约翰·约哈纳斯（John Johanas）分享了Hi-Fi Rush的最初概念。从那里，他提供了深入的细节，以了解开发团队关于接近这种节奏标题的早期知识。这需要从与以前完全不同的角度接近他们的游戏设计理念，从本质上讲是从他们期望的Hi-Fi Rush的结果中向后工作。John介绍了该团队如何通过游戏玩法获得这些学习的具体示例影响了游戏的其他核心元素 - 具体来说，如何用核心支柱定义他们的力学，为用户巩固了“正面反馈回路”，并降低了进入hi -fi rush的进入的障碍。本届会议涵盖了探戈如何将音乐和动作游戏类型组合在一起的方式，但是这种方法可以应用于试图在舒适区之外实施创意的任何团队。

vaults.overview: The Experimental Game Workshop, which has featured games like Baba Is You, Braid, Untitled Goose Game, and Card Shark is back for its 22nd year at GDC.In this fast-paced, game-packed session, panelists will showcase a selection of surprising and intriguing games made by innovation-minded game developers from all over the world. Come see what's happening in the world of Experimental Games, and be inspired!

vaults.title: Little Hands, Foul Moods, and Runny Noses: Designing Games for Kids
vaults.author: Carla Engelbrecht
vaults.overview: Children have unique intellectual and physical needs that designers must take into account in order to create engaging gaming experiences. This session aims to help developers build a foundation of knowledge by uncovering existing research on children and technology from a variety of fields, including child developmental psychology, human computer interaction, television, and market research. The discussion will provide information on developmental psychology specific to games, UI design and input control considerations, co-play, and age-appropriate storytelling. While some guidelines will be device-specific, most recommendations provided can be easily applied to any children's game design product, regardless of platform.
vaults.translated: 儿童有独特的智力和身体需求，设计师必须考虑这些需求，以创造引人入胜的游戏体验。本届会议旨在通过从各种领域（包括儿童发育心理学，人类计算机互动，电视和市场研究）揭示现有的有关儿童和技术的研究来帮助开发人员建立知识的基础。讨论将提供有关特定于游戏，UI设计和输入控制注意事项，共同游戏和适合年龄的讲故事的发育心理学的信息。尽管某些指南将是特定于设备的，但无论平台如何，提供的大多数建议都可以轻松地应用于任何儿童游戏设计产品。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Lore, Don't Tell: A Guide for Telling Culturally Rooted Stories Like 'Ve...
vaults.author: Abhi Swami
vaults.overview: When players are unfamiliar with a culture, how do we tell a story that's rooted in it? It's a responsibility to ensure players who play the game leave with a deeper understanding of the culture, society, heritage and traditions we're showcasing. But the game we make has its own story to tell, and there might not be the space to be educating all players. It might also be tempting to explain and point out every aspect of the culture to ensure a player misses nothing, but this can do more harm than good. Thankfully, "Lore" is a very powerful tool that video games are great at that we can leverage to solve this problem. In this talk, Creative Director Abhi outlines various techniques used to follow a "Lore, don't tell" approach that let him not only be laser focused on the story he wanted to tell in Venba but also helped him shine a light on the culture he loves with all its details
vaults.translated: 当玩家不熟悉一种文化时，我们如何讲一个植根于文化的故事？有责任确保玩游戏的玩家对我们展示的文化，社会，遗产和传统有更深入的了解。但是我们制作的游戏有自己的故事要讲，并且可能没有空间可以教育所有玩家。解释并指出文化的各个方面也可能很诱人，以确保玩家什么都没有错过，但这可能弊大于利。值得庆幸的是，“ Lore”是一个非常强大的工具，视频游戏非常出色，我们可以利用解决此问题。在这次演讲中，创意总监Abhi概述了遵循“传说，不要说出”的各种技术，这不仅让他专注于他想在Venba讲述的故事，而且还帮助他阐明了文化的启示他喜欢所有细节

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Making 'Assassin's Creed Nexus VR' Comfortable and Accessible
vaults.author: Olivier Palmieri
vaults.overview: Virtual Reality allows an amazing level of immersion in virtual worlds. But when it comes to locomotion, the ability to travel into these worlds may involve various degrees of discomfort, from fatigue to kinetosis (motion sickness). In Assassin's Creed Nexus VR, the open worlds of the game provide great opportunities for players to explore, parkour, climb, fight or go stealth, all of which presented unique challenges when designing a comfortable and accessible experience. The team presents the journey and share our experience working for several years on designing and building various features and presets to make the game comfortable and accessible for players. To conclude, the team presents features to help with potential fear of height, as players in Assassin's Creed Nexus VR will be able to parkour, climb and reach elevated heights, and can decide to experience the game's iconic leap of faith.
vaults.translated: 虚拟现实允许在虚拟世界中吸收惊人的水平。但是，在运动方面，进入这些世界的能力可能涉及从疲劳到动力学的各种程度的不适（运动）。在刺客的信条Nexus VR中，游戏的开放世界为玩家提供了探索，跑跑，攀登，战斗或进行隐身的绝佳机会，在设计舒适且可访问的体验时，所有这些都面临着独特的挑战。团队展示了旅程，并分享了我们在设计和建立各种功能和预设方面工作多年的经验，以使游戏舒适且易于访问。总而言之，该团队提出了一些功能，以帮助潜在的高度恐惧，因为刺客信条Nexus VR的玩家将能够跑，攀登和达到高度，并决定体验游戏的标志性信仰飞跃。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Making Linear Story Playable: The Narrative Design of 'Alan Wake 2'
vaults.author: Simon Wasselin
vaults.overview: Remedy has never shied away from complex stories and characters, and Alan Wake 2 features some of our most ambitious protagonists to date. When it came to putting players in the minds of both a talented FBI detective piecing together a supernatural mystery, and a tortured author attempting to write his way out of a web of darkness, Lead Narrative Designer Simon Wasselin (Quantic Dream) Principal Narrative Designer Molly Maloney (Telltale Games) had to tackle some big questions: How do we give players a satisfying interactive experience within the confines of a linear story that can't budge? How do we allow for player expression when the protagonists are locked into specific roles? How can we leverage interactivity to incept complex, multilayered exposition into the minds of our audience?This talk focuses on the design of the narrative mechanics used to convey exposition in Alan Wake 2. Join us as we discuss the challenges of agency vs expression, linear vs branching storytelling, and how by involving Narrative Design in gameplay we can create more powerful story experiences in AAA games.
vaults.translated: 补救措施从未避开复杂的故事和角色，艾伦·韦克（Alan Wake 2）2是我们迄今为止一些最雄心勃勃的主角。当涉及到一位才华横溢的联邦调查局侦探拼凑一个超自然的奥秘时，以及一位折磨的作家试图将自己的道路写出黑暗的网络，首席叙事设计师Simon Wasselin（Quantic Dream）主要叙事设计师Molly，马洛尼（Telltale Games）必须解决一些大问题：我们如何为玩家提供令人满意的互动体验，而在线性故事的范围内无法解决？当主角被锁定为特定角色时，我们如何允许玩家表达？我们如何将互动性利用构成复杂的多层博览会进入我们的观众的思想？这次演讲重点是用于在艾伦·韦克（Alan Wake 2VS分支讲故事，以及如何通过在游戏玩法中涉及叙事设计，我们可以在AAA游戏中创造更强大的故事体验。

vaults.overview: When building a mixed-reality game, crafting and harmoniously blending two worlds into a single space is a fundamental challenge. Designing a game that incorporates the player's room as part of the level means losing out on a lot of control that fully pre-authored level design grants developers.nnAs a pack-in launch title for the Quest 3, Meta's First Encounters wowed players by smashing apart and opening their rooms to another world. Learn how the game was designed to make careful & considered use of the player's space as a core element of the game's design. Discover how the development team approached interactively transforming the player's space through a mixture of scene understanding & at-runtime procedural generation.nnGame Designer Zachary Dawson and Game Programmer Alexander Dawson discuss the design, technical challenges, and solutions developed for turning every player's room into their own game world.
vaults.translated: 在建立混合现实游戏时，制作并和谐地将两个世界融入一个空间是一个根本的挑战。设计一个将玩家房间作为水平的游戏的游戏，意味着在许多人的控制中输掉完全撰稿的级别设计授予开发人员。NNAS为QUESP 3的封装启动标题，Meta的首次遇到的播放器通过粉碎而震惊分开，并向另一个世界开放房间。了解如何设计游戏来仔细并考虑将玩家的空间作为游戏设计的核心元素。发现开发团队如何通过融合场景的理解和到期时间的程序生成来互动地转换玩家的空间。自己的游戏世界。

vaults.title: Next-Gen Tech Forum: Own Your Creative Power: AI Workflows that Accelera...
vaults.author: Kent Keirsey
vaults.overview: This session will explore the impact of integrating AI image generation into existing creative workflows for game development. We will demonstrate how AI image generation technology can be securely incorporated into production pipelines, while providing artists and designers the same level of creative freedom and control that they are accustomed to. We will showcase practical examples from creative teams who are leveraging their own proprietary content and intellectual property. nnAdditionally, we will address critical ethical and legal issues such as the use of copyrighted material, the automation of creative tasks, and implications for job security within the industry. This session aims to offer a balanced perspective, demonstrating how AI can be a powerful tool in the creative process while acknowledging and addressing the challenges it presents.
vaults.translated: 本届会议将探讨将AI图像生成整合到现有创意工作流程中以进行游戏开发的影响。我们将展示如何将AI图像生成技术牢固地纳入生产管道中，同时为艺术家和设计师提供与他们所习惯的相同的创作自由和控制水平。我们将展示来自利用自己专有内容和知识产权的创意团队的实践例子。在不合理的情况下，我们将解决关键的道德和法律问题，例如使用受版权保护的材料，创造性任务的自动化以及对行业内部工作安全的影响。本届会议旨在提供平衡的观点，展示AI如何成为创作过程中的强大工具，同时承认并应对其提出的挑战。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Player Mythologies
vaults.author: Alexander Jaffe
vaults.overview: Designers build games around player fantasies. These typically concern something the player "pretends" to be inside a game. But another kind of fantasy is often overlooked: "Player Mythologies". These are the narratives through which players view themselves as players. Explorer, spy, collector, artist - these archetypes don't just describe a character in a game. Remarkably, they sometimes describe the actual players, and how a specific game or genre fits into players' lives. By understanding these narratives, designers can gain profound insight into their players' mindset and motivation, reshaping traditional ideas of "good" and "bad" design.In this talk, Alex Jaffe introduces player mythologies, showing their impact and their root causes in subtle design choices. He then presents a case study on the player mythology of fighting games. He shows how this lens unlocked his work on Riot Games' 2XKO (formerly Project L), and illuminates the beauty of the genre along the way.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Relic Ruins: Creating Environmental Puzzles for 'Horizon Forbidden West'
vaults.author: Daniel Wewerinke
vaults.overview: Horizon Forbidden West takes place in a massive open world filled with mysterious activities for players to encounter. Among such activities are the Relic Ruins: environmental puzzle spaces set in Horizon's ruins of the Old World, meant to challenge players to solve its mysteries. Senior Game Designer Daniel Wewerinke guides us through the design process for the Relic Ruins that players can find in Horizon Forbidden West as well as its DLC Burning Shores; from concept to block-outs, interdisciplinary work, playtesting, and iteration. He discusses both design challenges and lessons learned while aiming to create interesting, unique, and surprising puzzle spaces for the players.

vaults.title: Revisiting Fun: 20 Years of "A Theory of Fun"
vaults.author: Raph Koster
vaults.overview: A Theory of Fun for Game Design was first published twenty years ago. Today, it's required reading in game design programs all over the world. But times have changed! Our craft knowledge has evolved! nnThis talk will give an update on the latest science, discuss the impact of the book, and explore unexpected ways in which the original core idea continues to affect how we make games. Most importantly, it will give you new tools to tackle what is still the hardest problem in game design: making things fun.
vaults.translated: 二十年前首次出版了一种游戏设计理论。如今，这需要阅读世界各地的游戏设计程序。但是时代已经改变了！我们的手工艺知识发展了！nnththis Talk将提供有关最新科学的最新信息，讨论本书的影响，并探讨原始核心想法继续影响我们制作游戏的意外方式。最重要的是，它将为您提供新的工具来解决游戏设计中最困难的问题：使事情变得有趣。

vaults.overview: The speech focuses on Crystal of Atlan, a MMOARPG with millions of DAU, and introduces the design of cross-server operations, optimization of server CPU, memory, and network, as well as its deployment and maintenance.
vaults.translated: 演讲的重点是Atlan的晶体，Atlan是一个拥有数百万个DAU的MMOARPG，并介绍了跨服务器操作，服务器CPU，内存和网络的优化及其部署和维护的设计。

vaults.title: 'Minecraft' Players at the Center of the Universe of Big Data (Presented...
vaults.overview: This talk explores the vast and diverse world of Minecraft, focusing on the role of data-driven insights in improving player experiences. We'll delve into lessons from player pathing, segmentation, social listening, and discuss how these insights are applied to different areas of Minecraft. We'll demonstrate how effective prediction and recommendations can seamlessly integrate into the player experience to deepen player relationships.
vaults.translated: 本演讲探讨了《我的世界》的庞大而多样化的世界，重点是数据驱动的见解在改善玩家体验中的作用。我们将从玩家路径，细分，社交聆听中深入研究课程，并讨论如何将这些见解应用于Minecraft的不同领域。我们将展示如何无缝地集成到玩家体验以加深玩家关系的有效预测和建议。

vaults.title: 144FPS Rendering on Mobile: Frame Prediction in 'Arena Breakout' (Presen...
vaults.author: Yue Qi
vaults.overview: With the advancement of hardware technology, an increasing number of mobile devices support high screen refresh rates such as 120Hz, 144Hz, and even higher. This creates the challenge of increasing frame rates without sacrificing image quality in mobile rendering.nThis session introduces a frame-prediction-based rendering method (non-neural network) in Arena Breakout, specifically designed for achieving high frame rates, successfully implemented in the released game.. Frame prediction effectively reuses previously drawn pixels, significantly boosting the game's frame rate and reducing power consumption without adding latency to framebuffer presentation.nThe presentation includes the implementation of frame prediction, the corresponding rendering pipelines, accuracy and performance analysis, and a comparison with other solutions.
vaults.translated: 随着硬件技术的发展，越来越多的移动设备支持高屏幕刷新率，例如120Hz，144Hz，甚至更高。这会构成提高帧速率而不牺牲移动渲染中图像质量的挑战。游戏..框架预测有效地重用先前绘制的像素，大大提高了游戏的帧速率并降低了框架的延迟，而无需增加框架的延迟。与其他解决方案。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: 3D Toon Rendering in 'Hi-Fi RUSH'
vaults.author: Kosuke Tanaka
vaults.overview: 'Hi-Fi RUSH' is a 60fps rhythm action game rendered in a stylish 3D toon art style using a customized Unreal Engine 4. In 'Hi-Fi RUSH', the developers at Tango Gameworks used toon shading for the entire world, both character and environment, while providing modern 3D graphics features, all at 60fps at native resolution.Learn about the development of a deferred toon renderer developed for toon shading a 3D world in a 2D way. Various customized UE4 render passes along with added render passes of their own are stylized and combined inside deferred rendered post process volumes.Comic shaders, toon lights, dynamic shadow map strategies, static shadow maps, light probe GI, and their face shadow implementation will be discussed.Learn about the core tech behind the game as well as select graphics implementations.
vaults.translated: “ Hi-Fi Rush”是一种60fps的节奏动作游戏，使用定制的虚幻引擎4以时尚的3D Toon艺术风格呈现，在“ Hi-Fi Rush”中，Tango Gameworks的开发人员都为全世界都使用Toon Shading，这两个角色都是角色和环境在提供现代3D图形功能的同时，在本机分辨率下，所有这些都以60fps为单位。各种定制的UE4渲染通行证以及额外的渲染通行证都被风格化和组合，并在递延后渲染后的过程卷中进行了样式化和组合讨论了有关游戏背后的核心技术以及精选的图形实现。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Anatomy of a Frame in 'Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty'
vaults.author: Charles Tremblay
vaults.overview: Cyberpunk 2077 features an incredibly dense and action-packed world that places huge demands on CPU processingsomething that is pushed even further in the post-launch Episode Phantom Liberty. This talk dissects, in detail, a single CPU frame sampled from Phantom Liberty, in order to illustrate how the work for the various systems that drive the game are distributed across CPU cores in order to achieve 60 FPS gameplay in performance mode while updating one of the densest video game worlds to date. The process for how the team worked out their CPU budgets is described, as well as how they approached the challenge of balancing the desire to saturate CPU cores with useful work, and system update dependencies. Comparisons are made to CPU frames sampled in different gameplay situations to highlight the differences that can occur based on what is currently happening in the game.
vaults.translated: Cyber​​punk 2077具有一个令人难以置信的密集和动感十足的世界，对CPU处理的巨大需求在发出后的情节Phantom Liberty中进一步推动。本演讲详细阐述了一个从幻影自由采样的单个CPU框架，以说明如何在跨CPU核心分布驱动游戏的各种系统的工作，以便在性能模式下实现60 fps游戏，同时更新一个。迄今为止，最密集的视频游戏世界。描述了团队如何计算其CPU预算的过程，以及如何应对平衡渴望与有用的工作和系统更新依赖关系的愿望平衡的挑战。对在不同的游戏情况下采样的CPU帧进行了比较，以突出根据游戏中当前发生的情况进行的差异。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Applied Mesh Analysis: Automating Distant-City LODs in 'Marvel's Spider-...
vaults.author: Scott Kircher
vaults.overview: The New York City of Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is roughly twice as large as that of earlier titles in the series. At the same time, new quality and performance constraints required the creation of additional distant city LODs. The manual distant-LOD geometry pipeline of Marvel's Spider-Man and Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales was no longer viable. This lecture describes how Insomniac Games transitioned to automated distant-LOD geometry generation. In particular, it covers in-depth the applications of fundamental mesh analysis concepts (dual meshes, the Euler Characteristic, curvature estimation, etc...) to several difficult problems (beyond standard reduction and remeshing) that arise from the unique constraints regarding distant city LODs present in Marvel's Spider-Man 2.
vaults.translated: 纽约市漫威的蜘蛛侠2大约是该系列赛早期冠军的两倍。同时，新的质量和绩效限制需要创建其他遥远的城市LOD。Marvel的蜘蛛侠和Marvel的蜘蛛侠的手动远处几何管道：Miles Morales不再可行。该讲座描述了失眠游戏如何过渡到自动远处的几何产生。特别是，它涵盖了基本网格分析概念（双网格，欧拉特特征，曲率估计等）的应用，以源于几个困难问题（超出标准减少和重新构成），这些问题来自于远处的独特约束Marvel的蜘蛛侠2中出现的城市LOD。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Bringing Maximum Reality to Vulkan Games (Presented by Samsung)
vaults.author: Jungwoo Kim
vaults.overview: GPU DevTech is a game development support program started by Samsung that has been optimizing Vulkan games for better performing and deliver high fidelity graphics with Samsung Galaxy products since 2016.nnWe cover many modern game optimization techniques like Vulkan, Game scaling and ray tracing with the real game practices and also update about GPUWatch, a performance monitoring tool in Galaxy, and more.
vaults.translated: GPU DevTech是一项由三星启动的游戏开发支持计划，该计划一直在优化Vulkan游戏，以更好地表现性能，并自2016年以来使用三星Galaxy产品提供高保真图形。游戏实践以及有关GPUWatch，Galaxy中的性能监视工具等的更新。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Building New Types of Islands in Fortnite (Presented by Epic Games)
vaults.author: Robert Taylor
vaults.overview: This talk will introduce the audience to the new features available to Fortnite Creators in UEFN and Creative that can be used to build islands using various templates.
vaults.translated: 这次演讲将向观众介绍欧文特（Uefn）的Fortnite创作者可用的新功能，可用于使用各种模板来建造岛屿。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Building the Fully Connected Multiverse in 'Suicide Squad'
vaults.author: Ingimar Gumundsson
vaults.overview: This talk presents a method of how to support an environment design in a streaming open world that changes greatly over time within the game. The design allows for navigation data to be built, such that a predictable minimum set of offline data is readily available to complement the changing nature of the environment. Within this framework the talk will detail how to build connected navigation data that spans all surfaces, allowing agents to traverse walls, fly and reach the player at any location, quickly. Finally we address how to complement the system with dynamic elements that affect navigation.
vaults.translated: 本演讲介绍了一种如何在流媒体开放世界中支持环境设计的方法，这种设计随着时间的流逝而大大变化。该设计允许构建导航数据，从而可以很容易地使用可预测的最小离线数据集，以补充环境的变化性质。在此框架内，谈话将详细介绍如何构建跨越所有表面的连接导航数据，使代理可以迅速在任何位置穿越墙壁，飞行并触及播放器。最后，我们解决了如何使用影响导航的动态元素补充系统。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Can HLOD save your game? (Presented by Simplygon, Microsoft)
vaults.author: Jesper Tingvall
vaults.overview: Simplygon will share their knowledge on asset optimization for massive open world games. This talk will cover the key ingredient to making them run smooth, HLOD, including what it is and what tools are suitable for generating HLOD for static meshes and vegetation. Join us to learn how HLOD can improve the performance of Unreal Engine 5 games and how Simplygon fits into the Unreal Engine 5 eco system. Finally, get a quick overview of the latest news from Simplygon 10.3 which includes an improved Unity plugin and more.
vaults.translated: SimplyGon将分享他们对大型开放世界运动会资产优化的知识。这次演讲将涵盖使它们流畅，HLOD运行的关键要素，包括它是什么以及哪种工具适合生成HLOD用于静态网眼和植被。加入我们，了解HLOD如何改善虚幻引擎5游戏的性能，以及简单地符合虚幻引擎5 ECO系统的性能。最后，快速概述SimplyGon 10.3的最新消息，其中包括改进的Unity插件等等。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Chaos Physics in LEGO Fortnite: Building a Fully Interactive Sandbox Exp...
vaults.author: Michael Lentine
vaults.overview: Epic will present a deep dive into the technology used to make LEGO Fortnite fully interactive where nearly everything can be physically simulated and destroyed. This includes an in-depth look at updates to the Chaos Rigid Body Engine, Destruction, and Networked Physics systems as well as gameplay technology that enables nearly every construct to work with every other construct.
vaults.translated: Epic将深入研究用于使乐高乐高富斯尼特完全互动的技术，几乎所有内容都可以在物理上模拟和破坏。这包括对混乱僵硬的车身引擎，破坏和网络物理系统的更新以及游戏技术的更新，这些技术使几乎每个结构都可以与其他每个结构一起使用。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Choreographing Superpowered AI Movement in 'Suicide Squad'
vaults.author: Lingxiao Fu
vaults.overview: This talk presents an expressive and scalable AI movement stack that realizes diverse AI traversal behaviors in Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League. A hierarchical multi-modal pathfinding approach operating on hyper-connected navigation data is used to produce effective paths in the complex open world of Metropolis. A novel path-planning approach is introduced between pathfinding and path following to create more varied and nuanced traversal decisions. AI path is annotated and broken down into featured patterns based on agent movement constraints and preference and then solved by an HTN-style planner into traversal plans. An adaptive traversal plan execution layer allows AI agents to carry out the planned traversal with the ability to repair and adjust their actions on the fly.
vaults.translated: 这次演讲提出了一种表现力且可扩展的AI运动堆栈，它意识到自杀小队中的各种AI遍历行为：杀死正义联盟。在超连接导航数据上运行的分层多模式探路方法用于在复杂的大都市开放世界中产生有效的路径。在探路和路径之间引入了一种新颖的路径规划方法，以创建更多和细微的遍历决策。AI路径被注释并分解为基于代理运动约束和偏好的特征模式，然后由HTN式计划者解决遍历计划。自适应遍历计划的执行层使AI代理可以通过即时维修和调整其动作的能力进行计划的遍历。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Compile Score: Slay the C++ Build Time Dragon
vaults.author: Ramon Viladomat
vaults.overview: Build times have been affecting productivity and iteration times since the dawn of programming. Developer improvement efforts have been based on guesswork so far considering the compiler has always been a closed box. 'Compile Score' allows us to peek inside and dissect how the compiler digests the code empowering the engineer to make targeted improvements and identify the real bottlenecks.This presentation covers how to extract, interpret, and act with the provided data, as well as go through C++ best practices to keep the dependencies healthy. It also goes through the setup in Santa Monica Studio to get up to date information automatically to the whole team.
vaults.translated: 自编程曙光以来，构建时间一直在影响生产率和迭代时间。考虑到编译器一直是封闭式框，开发人员的改进工作一直是基于猜测。“编译得分”使我们能够窥视内部并剖析编译器如何消化代码，使工程师有能力进行有针对性的改进并确定真正的瓶颈。此演示文稿涵盖了如何提取，解释和使用所提供的数据以及GO进行的如何提取，解释和行动通过C ++的最佳实践，以保持依赖性健康。它还在圣莫尼卡工作室（Santa Monica Studio）进行了设置，以自动获取整个团队的最新信息。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Cross-Platform Determinism in 'Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin'
vaults.author: Bradley Pollard
vaults.overview: In this session, learn how and why Frontier Developments built a new deterministic simulation framework that underpins everything players see and interact with in Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin. Engineering Lead Bradley Pollard covers the journey taken by the development teamfrom implementing a thread-safe ECS to creating tooling to analyze and prevent desynchronizations. Learn how determinism benefits both the developers, as well as the game, by enabling reproducibility, providing low-cost networking, and even providing a form of anti-cheat. The talk also addresses how Frontier was able to create a framework that is able to run on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Linux, and ensure determinism.
vaults.translated: 在本届会议中，了解Frontier Developments如何以及为什么建立了一个新的确定性模拟框架，该框架为玩家在Sigmar的Warhammer时代所见和与之互动的所有事物支撑。工程负责人布拉德利·波拉德（Bradley Pollard）涵盖了开发团队从实施线程安全的EC进行创建工具以分析和防止异步的工具的旅程。了解确定论如何通过启用可重复性，提供低成本的网络，甚至提供一种反欺骗形式来使开发人员和游戏都受益。演讲还解决了Frontier如何创建能够在PC，Xbox，PlayStation和Linux上运行的框架，并确保确定性。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Delta Force Techniques From Unified Production Pipeline to Cross-Platfor...
vaults.author: Shangli Liang
vaults.overview: Delta Force is preparing to deliver top-tier experiences to gamers for all platforms. This session will cover an efficient production process while pursuing exceptional development quality as TiMi Studio Group readies for the release of a new edition to a classic FPS franchise. This talk will summarize the valuable experiences learned through the development process of Delta Force regarding various aspects of cross-platform production including asset management, open world solutions, auto scalable 3C, adaptive UI framework and the performance tracking tools we build for better tracking during the unified development process.
vaults.translated: Delta Force正在准备为所有平台的游戏玩家提供顶级体验。本届会议将涵盖一个高效的生产过程，同时追求特殊的开发质量，因为Timi Studio Group Regise是将新版本发布给经典FPS系列的新版本。这次演讲将总结通过三角洲力量开发过程中有关跨平台生产的各个方面所学到的宝贵经验统一的发展过程。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: DirectX State of the Union Ft. Work Graphs and Introducing DirectSR (Pre...
vaults.author: Shawn Hargreaves
vaults.overview: The DirectX team will showcase the latest updates, demos, and best practices for game development with key partners from AMD and NVIDIA. Work graphs are the newest way to take full advantage of GPU hardware and parallelize workloads. Microsoft will provide a preview into DirectSR, making it easier than ever for game devs to scale super resolution support across Windows devices. Finally, dive into the latest tooling updates for PIX.
vaults.translated: DirectX团队将与AMD和Nvidia的主要合作伙伴展示最新的更新，演示和游戏开发的最佳实践。工作图是充分利用GPU硬件并并行化工作负载的最新方法。Microsoft将提供DirectSR的预览，使游戏开发人员比以往任何时候都更容易扩展Windows设备的超级分辨率支持。最后，深入了解PIX的最新工具更新。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: ECS in Practice: The Case Board of 'Alan Wake 2'
vaults.author: Alexander Balakshin
vaults.overview: For Alan Wake 2, Remedy Entertainment is using a new data-oriented ECS gameplay framework instead of the previous object-oriented one. As a result, we have performance gains such as cache coherency and multithreading out of the box. Also, being implemented using some of the latest C++ features, the new framework changes the way gameplay programmers write their code by providing them some extra convenience and productivity.We will present how this framework is used for implementing one of the game's features the Case Board. We will cover how we describe the Case Board objects with components, how we register their systems, and how we interact with other modules (camera, cursor, etc.). Finally, we'll show how the interaction between C++ code and Lua scripts is organized.
vaults.translated: 对于Alan Wake 2，Remedy Entertainment使用了一个新的面向数据的ECS游戏框架，而不是以前面向对象的游戏框架。结果，我们在开箱即用之外具有诸如CACHE相干性和多线程等性能。此外，通过使用一些C ++功能来实施，新框架通过提供一些额外的便利性和生产力来改变游戏玩法编写代码的方式。我们将介绍该框架如何用于实现游戏的一个案例板之一。我们将介绍如何描述具有组件的案例板对象，如何注册其系统以及如何与其他模块（相机，光标等）进行交互。最后，我们将展示如何组织C ++代码与LUA脚本之间的相互作用。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Engineering Mayhem: Technical Deep-Dive into Environmental Destruction i...
vaults.author: Mans Isaksson
vaults.overview: THE FINALS is a fast-paced, competitive first person shooter with a focus on emergent gameplay and dynamic systems. Front and center of these systems is the destruction system which enables most of the environment to be destroyed, buildings to collapse, and debris from buildings to re-shape the play-space, all while being physically simulated.In this session, Mns Isaksson (Game Engineer at Embark Studios) walks through the technical challenges the team at Embark had to overcome to enable this level of destruction in THE FINALS. He walks you through the workflow from constructing and fracturing structures to integrating them into the playable environment, and explore technical aspects such as replication, simulation performance, rendering, and structural analysis calculations.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Farming Simulator Vehicle Integration Pipeline (Presented by GIANTS Soft...
vaults.author: Stefan Maurus
vaults.overview: The Farming Simulator game series showcases perhaps the most complex vehicles in the industry. In this talk it is all about the integration of those vehicles into the game, progressing from static 3D models to fully animated vehicles controllable by the user. Stefan Maurus, the lead integrator of GIANTS Software will explain the challenges his team faced by increasingly complex farming machinery and share insights into how they addressed specific cases. Additionally, he'll show clever techniques implemented to optimize performance. Given the game's highly modifiable nature, he'll also show you what has been done ensuring that all this technology is accessible to modders, providing a deeper understanding of the game's mod support.
vaults.translated: 农业模拟器游戏系列展示了行业中最复杂的车辆。在本次演讲中，这一切都是关于将这些车辆集成到游戏中的全部，从静态3D型号到完全由用户控制的动画车辆。巨人软件的首席集成商Stefan Maurus将通过日益复杂的农业机制来解释他的团队面临的挑战，并分享有关他们如何解决特定案例的见解。此外，他还将展示实施的巧妙技术来优化性能。鉴于游戏的高度修改性质，他还将向您展示已完成的操作，以确保Modders可以使用所有这些技术，从而更深入地了解游戏的MOD支持。

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: FP16 Shaders in Frostbite
vaults.author: Alexis Griffin-Lira
vaults.overview: This talk describes how Frostbite implemented multi platform 16 bit type (FP16) support for shaders in order to increase shader performance, especially on mobile. 16 bit shader types like half and short have advantages over 32 bit types, like occupancy and ALU performance. However, converting shaders to take advantage of half precision types is often not a straightforward process, in particular when accounting for platform and driver quirks. nnThis talk will cover the process of creating Frostbite's FP16 API, which enables shader programmers to write FP16 shaders while the tools bridge the platform gaps under the hood. The talk will also explain the rationale behind embracing FP16 in our shaders, the various challenges and quirks of FP16 in different platforms, and how we worked around them, and, finally, it concludes by presenting some of our performance and visual results on various console and mobile platforms.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Google Developer Summit: Android Input on Desktop: How to Delight Your U...
vaults.author: Shenshen Cui

vaults.translated: 本届会议将讨论在移动与PC游戏中处理输入的最佳实践的高级概述，包括有关如何在Android中实施这些最佳实践的技术详细信息游戏体验。

vaults.title: Google Developer Summit: Beyond "Set and Forget": Advanced Debugging wit...
vaults.author: Joe Spiro

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Google Developer Summit: Building Multiplatform Games with Flutter (Pres...
vaults.author: Zoey Fan
vaults.overview: Today, Flutter is used in more than 1M apps from small studios to large companies like Lotem and PUBG who are building beautiful, natively compiled, multi-platform applications from a single codebase. Casual games have become a big part of the Flutter ecosystem with the Casual Games Toolkit, a collection of free and open source tools, templates, and resources to make game dev more productive with Flutter.
vaults.translated: 如今，Flutter已用于从小型工作室到像Lotem和PubG这样的大型公司的100万个应用程序，这些公司正在从单个代码库中构建美丽，本质编译的多平台应用程序。休闲游戏已成为随意游戏工具包，免费和开源工具，模板和资源的集合，使游戏开发更具生产力的狂热，这已成为狂暴生态系统的重要组成部分。

vaults.title: Google Developer Summit: Creating a Global-scale Game with Google Cloud ...

vaults.title: Google Developer Summit: Enhancing Game Performance: Vulkan and Android ...
vaults.author: Dohyun Kim

vaults.translated: 在这次演讲中，发现几种方法来帮助您推进您的游戏开发。该会话将从如何利用Vulkan Graphics API开始以提高图形质量或性能，包括通过动态升级和额外的性能优化来提高图形质量或性能。然后，讨论将转向Android动态性能框架如何在Unity和Native C ++中提高游戏性能和功能，在虚幻引擎中以插件的形式释放，并检查如何改善NCSoft Slineage W. ARM中的热状态和性能。在舞台上展示游戏开发人员如何在虚幻引擎中实现ADPF插件，以增强玩家体验

vaults.title: How PlayFab Helped Texas Chainsaw Massacre Succeed (Presented by Microsoft)

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: How to Launch an Online Game and Still Attend the Launch Party
vaults.author: Christopher Shankland

vaults.title: Large Scale GPU-Based Skinning for Vegetation in 'Alan Wake 2'
vaults.author: Kiyavash Kandar

vaults.author: Yuchen Liao
vaults.overview: This presentation will introduce to you a character animation system using machine learning, dubbed MotorNerve, which implements two core character animation functions: locomotion control and transition animation generation. First, by combining Motion Matching and Learned Motion Matching technologies, MotorNerve achieves high-quality, low-consumption locomotion control while speeding up the tuning process for Learned Motion Matching. Secondly, MotorNerve also implements an inhouse Motion In-Betweening (MIB) algorithm, which uses a variational autoencoder to encode leg movements, significantly improving the foot skating problem of existing methods. This method, a joint work by Zhejiang University and TiMi Studio Group, a Tencent Games studio, has been published in SIGGRAPH 2022. MotorNerve applies MIB to interactive animation scenarios, generating high-quality transition animations while saving the project costs.

vaults.author: Joel Nilsson
vaults.overview: Stepups and mantles are an established part of the game character's repertoire, yet with increasingly complex game worlds traditional markup solutions have become increasingly cumbersome. In Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora we wanted to portray the full dense, organic beauty of Pandora while making the motion feel as flowing and unobstructed as you would expect from a Na'vi. In order to deal with these challenges we created a highly generic and (almost) markup-free system for stepups and mantling relying on a minimum of assumptions while trying to maximize freedom of movement. This talk presents the basic philosophy, concepts, and implementation of this solution. The focus is on providing a solid starting point for those just starting out with this problem and some useful tools for anyone working with it.

vaults.title: Adobe Developer Summit: The Art and Technology Behind Creating Character...
vaults.author: Alena Dubrovina
vaults.overview: The introduction of in-game cinematics was a game-changer for the character art team on Baldur's Gate 3, as this meant characters needed to look good not only from the perspective of top-down combat cameras but also for extreme close-ups in cinematics. Alena will demonstrate a breakdown of a character, discuss ways to speed up production, and highlight how much can be achieved with simple texture customization techniques.

vaults.name: Game Developers Conference 2024
vaults.title: Adobe Developer Summit: The Environment Art Technology and Workflows of ...

The talk will demonstrate prior conventions related to asset creation and texturing at the company and how these were improved during development. A deeper dive into physically based rendering (PBR) practices and pitfalls, Substance texturing processes and the in-engine (Northlight) developed landscape and material workflows will be provided as well as a glimpse into future tech development plans.
vaults.translated: 演讲将简要介绍叙事驱动的AAA游戏开发公司，补救娱乐公司，并深入了解Alan Wake 2开发的环境艺术工作流程。演讲将展示与资产创建相关的先前惯例并在公司的纹理以及在开发过程中如何改善。将提供更深入地研究基于物理的渲染（PBR）实践和陷阱，物质纹理过程以及内引擎（Northlight）开发的景观和材料工作流程，并瞥见未来的技术开发计划。

In this session, Sloyd will delve into exciting advancements in 3D AI, how it seamlessly integrates into game art production, and how their technology tackles three crucial challenges: maintaining topology quality, optimizing for speed, and addressing copyright concerns.

vaults.overview: In this session, Red Hook Studios' Lead Environment Artist, Marielle Fox, will discuss the pillars of Darkest Dungeon 2's environment art creation and how the art team established their unique workflow.nnShe will share the experiences of the team and the challenges they faced while trying to transition the 2D art style of the first Darkest Dungeon game to 3D for the sequel.
